Summary: Red bright light shot straight up into the air.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Bayard
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsTook my dog out with my girlfriend. I noticed a light in the sky to the East. It went straight up slowly, then accended rapidly. It looked like it was kind of far away but was so bright it was still visible. No sound at all. After it went straight up for 10-15 seconds the light just went out.
